wikipedia_page.main: Dame Glenis Willmott,  (née Scott; born 4 March 1951) is a retired British Labour Party politician who served as leader of the European Parliamentary Labour Party (EPLP) and Member of the European Parliament for the East Midlands.

response: *  1951   – Glenis Willmott, English scientist and politician
* Glenis Willmott – Labour MEP for East Midlands
